title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Utilizing Generative AI in Bilingual Education: Project-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational bilingual education theory and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can independently design bilingual education projects using generative AI tools (text generators, visual design tools, etc.).
Learners can prototype and evaluate an AI-supported bilingual instruction model by applying Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology.
Learners can identify and incorporate improvements in AI-based instructional design through expert feedback loops.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
